iOS Developer / Mobile Engineer (student)

Devmountain

I developed an iOS app using Swift to provide a simple user experience for real time tracking of stock portfolios. To serve data to the app, I developed a dedicated backend server for user management, portfolio management, and real time stock price data. Also, third party APIs are used by the backend server to obtain real-time stock price and historical data.
